AccountService.title: AccountService.0.94.0

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.specification: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

AuthFailureLoggingThreshold.description: This is the number of authorization failures that need to occur before the failure attempt is logged to the manager log.
AuthFailureLoggingThreshold.specification: This property shall reference the threshold for when an authorization failure is logged.  This represents a modulo function value, thus the failure shall be logged every nth occurrence where n represents the value of this property.

MinPasswordLength.description: This is the minumum password length for this service.
MinPasswordLength.specification: This property shall reference the minimum password length that the implementation will allow a password to be set to.

Accounts.description: Link to a collection of ManagerAccounts
Accounts.specification: This property shall contain the link to a collection of ManagerAccounts.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

AccountService.description: This is the schema definition for the Account Service.  It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to the actual list of accounts.
AccountService.specification: This resource shall be used to represent a management account service for an SPMA implementation.
